course_title: Topics In Computer Science: Design Studio in HCI
class_notes: In this course, students 1) will become acquainted with the human-centered design process, 2) will put the human-centered design process into action through design sprints with different technologies, and 3) will produce a portfolio of their designs throughout the semester.
sections: Class Nbr: 3346, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: E. Wall, Status: Open
